entries.description: The GOP voted to pass the Family and Small Business Taxpayer Protection Act while pushing the claim new funding will be used to hire 87,000 auditing agents.

entries.title: Russian TV Hears Call To Prepare Children To Fight: 'This Is World War III'
entries.description: '"We have to prepare our population in schools and everywhere else," a guest said on Russian state TV.

entries.title: Kaylee Goncalves' Sister Defends Surviving Idaho Roommate Over 911 Delay
entries.description: "I think everyone should stop passing judgments because you don't know what you would do in that situation," Alivea Goncalves said.

entries.title: Bob Saget's Wife Asks Elon Musk To Return Late Husband's Verified Status
entries.description: A year after the death of comedian Bob Saget, his wife Kelly Rizzo has asked Elon Musk to return her late husband's verified blue check mark.

entries.title: Matt Gaetz Says Defunding Ukraine Should Be Top Priority
entries.description: Matt Gaetz also said the U.S. could protect itself more efficiently as he spoke about the possibility of reducing defense spending.

entries.title: Labrador Collecting Giant Sticks Every Day for His Back Yard Melts Hearts
entries.description: Experts are not sure why dogs love sticks so much but theories range from their similarity to bones to their scent, which is often musky and earthy and attractive to dogs.

entries.title: Wordle Today #570 Hints, Tips and Answer for Tuesday, January 10 Puzzle
entries.description: Erhan Aslan, an associate professor of linguistics at the University of Reading in the U.K., told Newsweek that social media has been key to Wordle's viral spread.

entries.title: Young Boy Swept Away in California Flooding
entries.description: Rescuers were forced to call off the search for a 5-year-old swept away in Monday's floodwaters.

entries.title: Ukraine Joining NATO 'Logical' After Fighting Its 'Arch Enemy'—Ambassador
entries.description: "Ukraine will be full of NATO weaponry, and the people will be prepared," diplomat Vadym Prystaiko told Newsweek in London.

entries.title: Wealthy Tax Cheats Set to Benefit from Republicans' Defunding of IRS
entries.description: Experts tell Newsweek that repealing the funding for 87,000 IRS agents will make it easier for people to evade taxes.

entries.title: Trump Claims China 'Saw the Classified Documents' at Biden's Think Tank
entries.description: Despite the former president's claim, there is no evidence that Chinese agents saw the classified documents found in November at Penn Biden Center.

entries.title: Trump Mourns Death of Diamond and Silk's Lynette Hardaway
entries.description: The prominent conservative group Diamond and Silk first gained attention in 2016 after a series of pro-Trump social media posts.

entries.title: Illinois Advances 'One of the Strongest Assault Weapons Bans' in the U.S.
entries.description: "We are making Illinois' gun laws a model for the nation," top leaders said in a statement.

entries.title: Republicans Blasted After Voting to 'Gut' House Ethics Office
entries.description: GOP Representative George Santos, who is facing a barrage of backlash for lying before being elected, reportedly called the rules change "fantastic."

entries.title: Arizona Republicans Ditch Katie Hobbs' First State of the State Address
entries.description: The new Democratic governor, however, received a standing ovation from Democrats when discussing the state's water crisis and more funds for public education.

entries.title: Trump Hints FBI Should Raid White House, Biden's Homes Over Classified Docs
entries.description: The White House is likely to contain a large number of classified documents that Biden is legally entitled to possess as the current president.

entries.title: 'America's Got Talent: All-Stars': Vitoria Bueno's Moving Ballerina Journey
entries.description: Brazilian ballerina Vitoria Bueno came second on Germany's version of "Got Talent" in 2021, but can she make it all the way to the top spot on "AGT: All-Stars"?

entries.title: House Republicans' IRS Cuts Would Add Over $100B to Deficit: Budget Office
entries.description: The first proposal would cut $71 billion in funding for the IRS, impacting the agency's ability to enforce collections from the wealthy.

entries.title: Trump Ally Madison Cawthorn Confirms Move to Florida From North Carolina
entries.description: "One of the big contributing factors is that I know Byron Donalds is a leader in this state," Cawthorn said of his move to Florida.
